description:
Play the game with over 1500 years of history on the Palm in your hand.

Chess.com for WebOS lets you play correspondence chess against any of the million members of Chess.com.  Turn-based correspondence-style chess lets you play at any time and at your own speed without worrying about losing your phone connection or running out of time!

What is Chess.com? It's the #1 place to play free online chess and learn chess rules, openings, & strategies. You can also find chess games, explore downloads, and learn from the masters through video lessons, articles and the revolutionary Chess Mentor program.

Installing this app will give you access to some of these features and let you keep track of all your games no matter where you are, so download now to start enjoying all Chess.com has to offer!
